org.paces.Stata.Matrices

Class MataMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.paces.Stata.Matrices.MataMatrix

  • public class MataMatrix
extends Object
    Class used to construct POJO representation of Mata Matrix.
    Version:
    0.0.0
    Author:
    Billy Buchanan

    • Method Detail

      • setMatName

        public void setMatName()
        Setter method for the name of the matrix accessed from a local macro defined during prior to calling the javacall function from Stata.

      • getMatName

        public String getMatName()
        Getter method to access the name of the matrix
        Returns:
        A string object containing the name of the matrix originally passed from the javacall function in Stata

      • setNcols

        public void setNcols(String matrixName)
        Setter method for the number of columns in the named Mata Matrix
        Parameters:
        matrixName - The name of the Mata Matrix stored in the matName variable.

      • getNcols

        public Long getNcols()
        Getter method to access the total number of columns
        Returns:
        A Long object with the value of the number of columns

      • setNrows

        public void setNrows(String matrixName)
        Setter method for the number of rows in the named Mata Matrix
        Parameters:
        matrixName - The name of the Mata Matrix stored in the matName variable.

      • getNrows

        public Long getNrows()
        Getter method to access the total number of rows
        Returns:
        A Long object with the value of the number of rows

      • setColIndex

        public void setColIndex(Long ncol)
        Setter method for the colindex member variable
        Parameters:
        ncol - The number of columns in the Matrix previously named

      • getColIndex

        public List<Long> getColIndex()
        Getter method to access the column indices
        Returns:
        A List of long values identifying columns of the previously named Mata matrix

      • setRowIndex

        public void setRowIndex(Long nrow)
        Setter method for the rowindex member variable
        Parameters:
        nrow - The number of rows in the Matrix previously named

      • getRowIndex

        public List<Long> getRowIndex()
        Getter method to access the row indices
        Returns:
        A List of long objects identifying individual rows of the Mata Matrix

      • setMatrix

        public void setMatrix(List<Long> observations,
                      List<Long> variables)
        Method used to construct a POJO representation of the Mata matrix
        Parameters:
        observations - A List of row indices
        variables - A List of column indices

      • getMatrix

        public Object getMatrix()
        Getter method to access the POJO representation of the Mata Matrix
        Returns:
        A POJO representation of the Mata Matrix

      • getMatrixData

        public Object getMatrixData(Long colid,
                            Long rowid)
        Generic method to return data from a Mata Matrix
        Parameters:
        colid - The value of the matrix column from which to obtain a value
        rowid - The value of the matrix row from which to obtain a value
        Returns:
        A POJO containing the value for X[m, n]; The method returns a value of class Object regardless of whether the type is complex, real, or string.
